page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: WATERCRESS BEDS The farm is situated on Lilley Bottom Road.They call it Nine Wells.The people who own it are D.Sansom and his two sons. At school we started a project about the watercress beds.The people who are doing the project are Simon Sansom, Andrew and me.Simon's dad works on the watercress beds with his twin brother and father.It has been in his family for over one hundred and fifty years.When the weather was fine Simon Sansom,Andrew and I went down to the watercress beds to look at the fresh watercress while we were waiting for Mrs.Sansom.It was very fresh.Then we had a look at the boxes which the watercress goes in and he showed us how to fold them.Twenty bunches will fit in a box and each bunch costs twenty pence.
